title: Merge command files into cli.py
description:
{
  "priority": 4,
  "type": "refactor",
  "context": "Consolidate 5 command files into single cli.py. Currently: extract_command.py, transcribe_command.py, process_command.py, export_markdown_command.py, cli_utils.py.",
  "business_context": "Reduces file count, simplifies imports. All commands in one logical location.",
  "technical_requirements": [
    "Inline all command functions into src/cli.py",
    "Maintain all CLI functionality",
    "Keep click decorators and options",
    "Delete src/commands/ directory (5 files, 600 LOC)",
    "Run CLI integration tests"
  ],
  "success_criteria": [
    "All commands in single cli.py (~300 LOC)",
    "commands/ directory deleted",
    "All CLI commands work correctly",
    "Tests pass"
  ]
}

parsed_description.context: Consolidate 5 command files into single cli.py. Currently: extract_command.py, transcribe_command.py, process_command.py, export_markdown_command.py, cli_utils.py.
